home.offerNewDimension: Give a new dimension to your spaces.
home.trustSubtitle: Discover the companies that chose Stand By Me to elevate their spaces.
home.Jean-Baptiste drives the vision and stra: Jean-Baptiste drives the vision and strategy, blending creativity and leadership to shape every project's success.
home.Vladimir builds strong client relationsh: Vladimir builds strong client relationships and drives business growth with clarity and ambition.
home.Candice brings fresh energy and precisio: Candice brings fresh energy and precision, ensuring each project runs smoothly from idea to delivery.
home.Nathalie leads each project with precisi: Nathalie leads each project with precision, ensuring clarity, coordination, and client satisfaction.
home.Perrine ensures smooth day-to-day operat: Perrine ensures smooth day-to-day operations with precision, care, and unwavering dedication.
home.testimonial1: For this second year of collaboration, the Stand By Me team successfully evolved our booth by optimizing what already existed, all while remaining committed to a CSR approach. We are very satisfied working with Stand By Me, a local company that demonstrates great adaptability to the specific needs of an inter-professional organization. The setup went smoothly without a hitch!
home.testimonial2: We wanted to thank you for your help in setting up the UTMB Chamonix, which was a real success for HOKA! Your support was truly appreciated — thank you again for your responsiveness to our many requests!
home.testimonial3: This is the largest booth we’ve ever had, and every time we receive great feedback from our clients and partners about your stands. I want to commend your teams for their smooth communication, punctuality, and availability. The booth takedown was flawless. Once again, congratulations on this highly successful A+A edition!

footer.slogan: Design agency for spaces: Stand - Showroom - Retail - Virtual

contact.title: Feel free to contact us.
contact.description: Looking to make an impact with a stand, showroom, or immersive space? Let’s talk about your ideas and create experiences that make a difference.
contact.SayHelloTitle: Say hello, and let’s bring your projects to life.

portfolio.everyDetailCounts: Where every detail matters, our work stands out.

savoir-faire.title2: Comprehensive Expertise to Turn Your Ideas into Powerful Experiences
savoir-faire.title3: Powerful event solutions, designed just for you.
savoir-faire.Plongez au cœur de l'action avec notre v: Dive into the heart of the action with our virtual booth tour, where you can explore every detail, admire the products, and feel the atmosphere of the stand.
savoir-faire.Capturez l’essence de vos événements ave: Capture the essence of your events with our photo and video footage, enhanced by dynamic editing.
savoir-faire.Optimisez l’impact de votre stand grâce: Maximize the impact of your booth with a measurement tool designed to track its performance in real time.
savoir-faire.serviceText1: From the welcome smile to the musical atmosphere, including security and service, every detail matters to create a smooth and memorable event.
savoir-faire.serviceText2: Innovate with interactive and smart tools to grab attention, generate qualified leads, and measure the impact of your actions. The stand becomes a connected experience.
savoir-faire.serviceText3: Capture your projects with professional photos and videos that showcase your expertise and extend the life of your events well beyond the trade show.
savoir-faire.ecoMainTitle: Concrete commitments for a sustainable future
savoir-faire.ecoMainSubtitle: Stand By Me is committed to a responsible, sustainable, and innovative approach driven by concrete and measurable actions.
savoir-faire.ecoText1: As a member of UNIMEV, Stand By Me has committed to a responsible green growth initiative in collaboration with 7 ministries.
savoir-faire.ecoText2: A standardization process underway toward ISO 20121 certification by 2025, ensuring sustainable event management.
savoir-faire.ecoText3: In 2023, Stand By Me joined BPI France’s 'Excellence' program, a recognition of an innovative and exemplary entrepreneurial journey.
savoir-faire.ecoText4: The CEO of Stand By Me is an active board member of LEADS and a committed member of UNIMEV, contributing to the evolution of the event industry.
savoir-faire.ecoText5: In 2024, supported by EveryOneEco to carry out the first carbon footprint assessment, followed by a 24-month emission reduction plan.
